<h3 style="margin-top:5;margin-bottom:5;">Details</h3>
<p align="justify">
CHELSA provides monthly data on precipitation and temperature, derived by downscaling global atmospheric models. The temperature data is based on statistical  downscaling  of  atmospheric  temperatures, while the precipitation data incorporates orographic predictors such as wind fields, valley exposition,  and  boundary  layer  height,  with  a  subsequent  bias  correction. This dataset provides annual aggregates of CHELSA based on monthly precipitation, Potential Evapotranspiration (PET), and minimum, maxmimum and  mean temperatures.
</p>
